name: Art Trainer
description:
Art Trainer is a free-to-use tool to help practice/drill some skills for drawing, for example, perspective. This tool is not a replacement for lessons, but to provide a few exercises.

It's laggy on WebGL, I'll export it as a desktop application later.

This is a proof of concept in early development that's worked on during my free time. I am very new to art, so some ideas and feedback is definitely welcome.

My email is alanduu50@gmail.com and Discord is Alanski#0001 if you have any questions.

Thank you for testing this tool out!
